scripts.caption: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "vite" "cd ../backend && pip install -r full_requirements.txt && python server.py --enable-modules=caption"
scripts.caption-remote: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "vite --host" "cd ../backend && pip install -r full_requirements.txt && python server.py --enable-modules=caption --listen"
scripts.classify: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "vite" "cd ../backend && pip install -r full_requirements.txt && python server.py --enable-modules=classify"
scripts.classify-remote: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "vite --host" "cd ../backend && pip install -r full_requirements.txt && python server.py --enable-modules=classify --listen"
scripts.full: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "vite" "cd ../backend && pip install -r full_requirements.txt && python server.py --enable-modules=caption,classify"
scripts.full-remote: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "vite --host" "cd ../backend && pip install -r full_requirements.txt && python server.py --enable-modules=caption,classify --listen"
scripts.custom: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -- "npm run server" "vite --host" "cd ../backend && pip install -r full_requirements.txt && python server.py"
